tasks.label: build Debug
tasks.command: conan install . --build=missing -pr Profiles/Windows_x64_Debug ; cmake --preset conan-default ; cmake --build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug --preset conan-debug

tasks.label: build Sanitize
tasks.command: conan install . --build=missing -pr Profiles/Windows_x64_Debug ; cmake --preset conan-default ; cmake --build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug --preset conan-debug -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS="-fsanitize=address  -fsanitize=leak -g" -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS="-fsanitize=address  -fsanitize=leak -g" -DCMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS="-fsanitize=address  -fsanitize=leak" -DCMAKE_MODULE_LINKER_FLAGS="-fsanitize=address  -fsanitize=leak"

tasks.label: build Release
tasks.command: conan install . --build=missing -pr Profiles/Windows_x64_Release ; cmake --preset conan-default ; cmake --build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release --preset conan-release
